column4: Has anybody had this problem whilst installing Gustsy Gibbon. Something like it get's stuck shortly after entering "install" at kboot.
It starts to install fine, then gets stuck at USB bus 1
it says "driver sb_06 : USB bus 1
my Ubuntu install keeps getting stuck at "driver sb_06 USB bus 1". Can anyone help please?
anyone?
Can anyone help me with my Ubuntu install problem?
... am I invisible?
I'm having a PROBLEM installing Ubuntu Gutsy Gibbon 7.10. Installation keeps getting stuck at "driver sb_06 : USB bus 1"
I'm having a problem installing Ubutnu. It keeps getting stuck. Can anyone help please?
no
what version
gutsy gibbon 7.10
what's the issue?
fresh install? desktop or server
shortly after I enter "install" at the kboot, it gets stuck on a line that says
driver sb_06 USB bus 1
and it's a fresh install
so when you say kboot, are you loading teh live cd?
No, not a live cd. the one here > http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/custom/20071025-gutsy-ps3/
it says it's a custom one that's fixed the install issues with the other one
are you running a ps3?
yes I am
I've installed gusty gibbon 7.04 sucessfully before in the past
ah; not sure then, only ever done it on PCs... maybe one of the other guys can help you more... :-(
